author: tchent (ttt)
content:
公司名稱，統編(中華民國以外註冊可免填):Robert Walters, 53546368
公司地址(填寫詳細至號): 台北市信義區松智路1號10樓

Position: Full-stack Engineer
Location: Xinyi


Responsibilities:
·         Full stack web application development with a variety of languages including but not limited to Java, JavaScript, HTML, etc
·         Implement web interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
·         Implement RESTful web services using Java or Node.js

Requirements:
·         A solid computer science foundation including programming languages, operating systems, and databases
·         Proficiency in either Java, Node.js or any backend languages
·         2+ years of experience with Frontend development (JavaScript, HTML, CSS)
·         2+ years of experience with relational databases and SQL, preferably MySQL
·         Experience with Java, Node.JS and C++  is a plus


Salary: 1.2-1.5M, depending on related experience

員工是否需自備工具? (是/否) :否
加班費制度: 比照勞基法


人資或徵才聯絡方式: Ruby Lin of Robert Walters, a global headhunting company.
Dir: +886 2 8758 0706
E-mail: 

Web: www.robertwalters.com.tw

Also welcome to refer any of your friends who might be interested in this role. We will provide NTD10,000 referral fee for each successful placement.  : )


--

title: [徵才] Robert Walters代徵全端工程師
